author: Bindu Shajan Perappadan
text:
Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Mufti Mohammad Sayeed, who is admitted to the Intensive Care Unit of AIIMS, continues to be critical 12 days after he was brought here with acute health complications. He is on ventilator support since Sunday.

“He is hemodynamically stable but requires respiratory support; he continues to be on essential medications and supportive therapy,” an AIIMS statement said. The 79-year-old leader was airlifted to AIIMS from Srinagar on December 24 after he complained of exhaustion.
title: Mufti continues to be critical
